assignments.name: Set_Http_Code_for_Unknown_API_Call_Error
assignments.label: Set Http Code for Unknown API Call Error

assignments.name: Set_Http_Code_Other_Than_200_OK
assignments.label: Set Http Code Other Than 200 OK

formulas.name: formulaBirthdate
formulas.expression: IF( LEN({!InputBirthDate}) = 10, {!InputBirthDate}, IF( LEN({!InputBirthDate}) = 9, IF( FIND("-", MID({!InputBirthDate}, 6, 1)) > 0, LEFT({!InputBirthDate}, 5) & "0" & MID({!InputBirthDate}, 6, 2), LEFT({!InputBirthDate}, 8) & "0" & RIGHT({!InputBirthDate}, 1) ), LEFT({!InputBirthDate}, 5) & "0" & MID({!InputBirthDate}, 6, 1) & "-0" & RIGHT({!InputBirthDate}, 1) ) )
